issue.title: [Rust] Blog post for versions 7-9
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15675](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15675). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be good to tell the world about the progress we have made
